title: The Boy
lyrics: geobi naseo shijakjocha an hae bwattamyeon geudaen tudeoldaeji mara jom (GG) jujeohamyeon gihweneun modu neoreul bikyeo ga gaseum pyeogo nawa bwara jom (T.R.X) Bring the boys out sullie matchweo saneun geot amdamhan sesangi geudael geunyang bol suga eopseo nan bu dichigo kkaejeodo myeot beonigo ireo na nal karopge meotjige ireul naegoya maldeon ni yaseongeul boyeo jweo B-bring the boys out
